meta.title: Multi Image Cropper - Crop Multiple Areas Online
meta.description: Free online multi-image cropper tool. Crop multiple areas from a single image and download them individually or as a ZIP file.

tagline: Crop multiple areas from an image instantly

description.title: What is Multi Image Cropper?
description.text: Multi Image Cropper is a free online tool that allows you to select and crop multiple areas from a single image simultaneously. Instead of cropping one by one, you can define multiple regions and download them all at once.

howTo.title: How to Use Multi Image Cropper
steps: Upload an image by clicking the upload area
Click and drag on the image to create a crop area
Repeat to create multiple crop areas
Adjust the size and position of each crop area as needed
Click 'Download' on individual crops or 'Download ZIP' to get all crops at once

features.title: Key Features
list: ‚úÇÔ∏è Multi-Crop: Select multiple areas from one image
üì¶ ZIP Download: Download all cropped images in a single ZIP file
üñºÔ∏è Format Support: Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats
üîí Secure: Processing happens locally in your browser

questions.q: Is my image sent to a server?
questions.a: No, all image processing is performed entirely within your browser using JavaScript. Your images never leave your device.

questions.q: Can I crop multiple images at once?
questions.a: Currently, this tool focuses on cropping multiple areas from a *single* image. To crop multiple different images, you would need to process them one by one.
We support common web image formats including JPG, PNG, and WebP.
